summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 54th Avenue South, from Roxbury Street to Renton Avenue; by constructing wood curbs and gutters and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8964 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
